definition: prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: However Pinot Blanc balances between softness and freshness to make the lightest wine in Alsace.
sentences.chinese: 白皮诺比其他阿尔萨斯白葡萄酒芳香味淡点。

sentences.english: The stylistic vision of this wine is an "Oregon version" of Alsatian Pinot Gris.
sentences.chinese: 此款酒用俄勒冈产阿尔萨斯白皮诺酿造。

sentences.english: France ceded Alsace-Lorrance to Germany in 1871.
sentences.chinese: 法国于1871年将阿尔萨斯和洛林割让给德国。

sentences.english: Alsace has a good network of trains and buses.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔萨斯有一个良好的铁路及公交网络。

sentences.english: The plague is discovered in Alterac by Jaina and Arthas.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔萨斯与珍娜发现奥特兰克的瘟疫。

sentences.english: The Poodle, the Pom, the Alsatian.
sentences.chinese: 狮子狗，博美狗，阿尔萨斯。

sentences.english: Uther informs King Terenas of Arthas's actions.
sentences.chinese: 乌瑟尔向国王泰瑞纳斯报告了阿尔萨斯的行动。

sentences.english: Ah! it has been the great misfortune of our Alsace always to postpone its lessons until to-morrow.
sentences.chinese: 我们阿尔萨斯人的最大不幸就是把教育拖延到明天。

sentences.english: Uther and the knights of the Silver Hand rescues Arthas at Hearthglen.
sentences.chinese: 乌瑟尔与银手骑士团赶来，在熔炉谷解救了阿尔萨斯。

sentences.english: Arthas murdered his father and lead the Scourge to laying waste to Lordaeron.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔萨斯杀死了他的父亲，把瘟疫带到了洛丹伦。

sentences.english: Players will be fighting alongside Prince Arthas before he falls to the Lich King.
sentences.chinese: 玩家将在阿尔萨斯堕落成巫妖王之前与他并肩作战。

sentences.english: Peace was signed at Frankfort surrendering the provinces of Alsace and Lorraine to the Germans.
sentences.chinese: 和平协议在法兰克福签署，阿尔萨斯和洛林。

definition: Burgundy (Bourgogne), kingdom during medieval period, now region of France
Attila (406-453), Hun emperor, known as the scourge of God
the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
Charlemagne (c. 747-c. 814), King of the Franks, Holy Roman Emperor from 800

pinyin: Shen2 sheng4 Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2

definition: Jeanne d'Arc (1412-1431), French heroine and liberator, executed as a witch by the Burgundians and English/also called Jehanne Darc, the Maid or Orleans, Joan of Arc or St Joan
